question: Hi there, I'm very new to your board and am trying to find out as much as I can right now about Hep C in combination with high blood pressure and diabetes.  Have a great person (that I've fallen in love with) in my life that has this combination, and I am soooo ignorant.  Would appreciate any help on how I should know, or if there's anything I should look out for.sb:>
title: gathering information
